reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater stylish and warm, with good fit and quality.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality is very nice
items.body: Fit well (it’s a bit large but overall is good fit) and is warm and cozy. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Sweater!
items.body: Cute bulky sweater! It looked cute with pants or a skirt. It’s very comfortable and washes well. There is no tag to tell front or back, so you are kinda rolling the dice every time. Read more
items.author: Brittany Kata

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as described but nice
items.body: Site photos show leopards as off white and black. Leopards are actually an orangey beige and black. Also, length is shorter than shown in Site pictures. Sweater ,Large size, hits about third of way down high waist jean zipper. Returning it because of these differences. Disappointed..because.... It is soft and seemed to be well made. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun sweater!
items.body: I love this sweater! The print is so fun and the sweater itself isn’t too thick but is still quite warm. Read more
items.author: Zoe Clarke

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and true to size
items.body: Fit great. Got lots of compliments. But from close up, you can tell it's a cheaper fabric and will likely need a sweater shaver for the pilling after one wear (but not so cheap that i wouldn't buy more colors). I bought it to wear with a fun sequined skirt but ended up doing something else for my birthday so just paired it with leggings. Read more
items.author: Nicole Gill GLAM

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: Arrived yesterday. Ordered it two days ago. Package well. Tried it on and it fits nicely. Warm too. I like the semi high neckline. It is slightly oversized, so definitely not tight fitting at all. I ordered the white colored cats so it can go with anything else I wear with it. Just got it, so I don't have a comment on washing/drying or long time wear. Read more
items.author: Pazbaby

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Horrible fabric and smell very chemical
items.body: Very chemical smell , fabric felt horrid not soft but a fake fill of some sort. Almost as it has a coating on it. I was extremely disappointment as the style was cute but not cozy very artificial fabric and smell. Read more
items.author: MissA

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Purple Gray, Blue, Green Orange, Hot Pink, Black, Brown Red, Blue Orange, Orange, Green Yellow, Grey Black, Coffee Brown, Purple, Green White, Brown Animal. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
